short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily wrap keywords in exact, phrase, or broad match formats and discover trending keywords to boost your campaigns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Keyword Strategy with TrendWrapper

TrendWrapper is the ultimate tool for efficient keyword management and trending insights. Whether you're a marketer, content creator, or advertiser, this extension helps you seamlessly wrap and combine keywords in exact, phrase, or broad match formats.

Discover trending keywords in real-time through our advanced API or generate keyword suggestions locally using device cookies. We prioritize user privacy by ensuring that cookies are only accessed with your explicit consent. All data is processed securely on your device, with no information shared externally.

With a user-friendly interface, you can view, wrap, and combine keywords directly in the popup for faster workflows and better results. Transparent by design, our extension includes detailed comments in the code for easy tracking and debugging, reflecting our commitment to trustworthiness and functionality.

Download TrendWrapper today and elevate your keyword game with precision and real-time insights. Currently free while in development, this extension is your gateway to smarter marketing strategies.

Our Privacy Policy
